experience.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant

full_description: Collaborated with a research team to study the synthesis of novel organic compounds
Conducted experiments using chromatography, spectroscopy, and other analytical techniques
Analyzed and interpreted data, contributing to a research paper submitted for publication

experience.title: Fabrication of a Miniature Chemical Reactor
full_description: Engineered a small-scale chemical reactor using principles of chemical engineering

experience.title: The Green Thumb Chemist
